@return true if the current thread is the test thread
methods.name: isTestThread
methods.comment: Returns true if the current thread is the test thread

return.comment: true if the current thread is the test thread

methods.name: isTestThread
methods.comment: Returns true if the given thread is the test thread

methods.name: filterTrace
methods.comment:
Filters the given stack trace to remove entries known to be present in the test 
 thread that offer little forensic value
